languages.text: "Это стоило всего". {n}Мессия Прерывания смотрит на свои ладони, на которых пляшут искры разрушительной зеленой энергии.{/n} "Величайшая честь — быть тем, кому Омниссия послал свой дар. Величайшая ересь — отвергнуть его и дать ему кануть в забвение".

"All of it was worth it." {n}The Messiah of Discontinuing looks at the palms of his hands, on which sparks of destructive green energy are dancing.{/n} "It is the greatest honour to be the one upon whom the Omnissiah has bestowed His gift. It is the greatest heresy to reject it and allow it to sink into oblivion."
languages.original_text: "Это стоило всего". {n}Мессия Прерывания смотрит на свои ладони, на которых пляшут искры разрушительной зеленой энергии.{/n} "Величайшая честь — быть тем, кому Омниссия послал свой дар. Величайшая ересь — отвергнуть его и дать ему кануть в забвение".

traits.locale_text: "All of it was worth it." {n}The Messiah of Discontinuing looks at the palms of his hands, on which sparks of destructive green energy are dancing.{/n} "It is the greatest honour to be the one upon whom the Omnissiah has bestowed His gift. It is the greatest heresy to reject it and allow it to sink into oblivion."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这一切都值得。”{n}终结的弥赛亚看着自己的手掌。他的手掌上跃动着绿色的能量火花，充满了破坏性的力量。{/n}“能得到欧姆尼塞亚赐予的礼物，是最大的荣耀。若是拒绝祂的礼物，让它沉入遗忘之中，那才是最严重的异端行为。”
languages.original_text: "All of it was worth it." {n}The Messiah of Discontinuing looks at the palms of his hands, on which sparks of destructive green energy are dancing.{/n} "It is the greatest honour to be the one upon whom the Omnissiah has bestowed His gift. It is the greatest heresy to reject it and allow it to sink into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: “这一切都值得。”{n}终结的弥赛亚看着自己的手掌。他的手掌上跃动着绿色的能量火花，充满了破坏性的力量。{/n}“能得到欧姆尼塞亚赐予的礼物，是最大的荣耀。若是拒绝祂的礼物，让它沉入遗忘之中，那才是最严重的异端行为。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Todo esto ha valido la pena». {n}El Mesías de la Discontinuidad se mira las palmas de las manos, que crepitan con chispas de energía verde destructiva.{/n} «Es el mayor de los honores que el Omnissiah me haya otorgado su regalo. Rechazarlo y dejar que cayera en el olvido sería la mayor de las herejías».
languages.original_text: "All of it was worth it." {n}The Messiah of Discontinuing looks at the palms of his hands, on which sparks of destructive green energy are dancing.{/n} "It is the greatest honour to be the one upon whom the Omnissiah has bestowed His gift. It is the greatest heresy to reject it and allow it to sink into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: «Todo esto ha valido la pena». {n}El Mesías de la Discontinuidad se mira las palmas de las manos, que crepitan con chispas de energía verde destructiva.{/n} «Es el mayor de los honores que el Omnissiah me haya otorgado su regalo. Rechazarlo y dejar que cayera en el olvido sería la mayor de las herejías».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「そのすべてに価値があった」{n}廃絶の救世主は、破壊的な緑のエネルギーの火花が舞う手のひらを見る。{/n}「万機神がその賜物を授けられた者となることは最大の栄誉である。それを拒絶し、忘却の彼方に沈ませることは最大の異端なのだ」
languages.original_text: "All of it was worth it." {n}The Messiah of Discontinuing looks at the palms of his hands, on which sparks of destructive green energy are dancing.{/n} "It is the greatest honour to be the one upon whom the Omnissiah has bestowed His gift. It is the greatest heresy to reject it and allow it to sink into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: 「そのすべてに価値があった」{n}廃絶の救世主は、破壊的な緑のエネルギーの火花が舞う手のひらを見る。{/n}「万機神がその賜物を授けられた者となることは最大の栄誉である。それを拒絶し、忘却の彼方に沈ませることは最大の異端なのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Es war es alles wert." {n}Der Messias der Unterbrechung blickt auf seine Handflächen, auf welchen Funken zerstörerischer grüner Energie tanzen.{/n} "Es ist die größte Ehre überhaupt, aus Auserwählter das Geschenk des Omnissiah zu erhalten. Es ist die größte Ketzerei, es abzulehnen und in Vergessenheit geraten zu lassen."
languages.original_text: "All of it was worth it." {n}The Messiah of Discontinuing looks at the palms of his hands, on which sparks of destructive green energy are dancing.{/n} "It is the greatest honour to be the one upon whom the Omnissiah has bestowed His gift. It is the greatest heresy to reject it and allow it to sink into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: "Es war es alles wert." {n}Der Messias der Unterbrechung blickt auf seine Handflächen, auf welchen Funken zerstörerischer grüner Energie tanzen.{/n} "Es ist die größte Ehre überhaupt, aus Auserwählter das Geschenk des Omnissiah zu erhalten. Es ist die größte Ketzerei, es abzulehnen und in Vergessenheit geraten zu lassen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Tout en valait la peine. » {n}Le Messie de l'Interruption regarde la paume de ses mains, où dansent des étincelles d'une énergie verte destructrice.{/n} « Il n'y a pas d'honneur plus grand que de se voir accorder le don de l'Omnimessie. Il n'y a pas d'hérésie plus grande que de le rejeter et de le laisser tomber dans l'oubli. »
languages.original_text: "All of it was worth it." {n}The Messiah of Discontinuing looks at the palms of his hands, on which sparks of destructive green energy are dancing.{/n} "It is the greatest honour to be the one upon whom the Omnissiah has bestowed His gift. It is the greatest heresy to reject it and allow it to sink into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: « Tout en valait la peine. » {n}Le Messie de l'Interruption regarde la paume de ses mains, où dansent des étincelles d'une énergie verte destructrice.{/n} « Il n'y a pas d'honneur plus grand que de se voir accorder le don de l'Omnimessie. Il n'y a pas d'hérésie plus grande que de le rejeter et de le laisser tomber dans l'oubli. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "All of it was worth it." {n}The Messiah of Discontinuing looks at the palms of his hands, on which sparks of destructive green energy are dancing.{/n} "It is the greatest honour to be the one upon whom the Omnissiah has bestowed His gift. It is the greatest heresy to reject it and allow it to sink into oblivion."

languages.text: "Her şeye değdi." {n}Bozulum Mesihi, avuçlarının içinde dans eden, yok edici, yeşil enerji kıvılcımlarına bakıyor.{/n} "Hermesih'in armağanını bahşettiği kişi olmaktan daha büyük onur yoktur. Onu reddetmek ve hiçliğe karışmasına izin vermek de en büyük kâfirlik olurdu."
languages.original_text: "All of it was worth it." {n}The Messiah of Discontinuing looks at the palms of his hands, on which sparks of destructive green energy are dancing.{/n} "It is the greatest honour to be the one upon whom the Omnissiah has bestowed His gift. It is the greatest heresy to reject it and allow it to sink into oblivion."

traits.locale_text: "Her şeye değdi." {n}Devamsızlık Mesihi, avuçlarının içinde dans eden yok edici yeşil enerji kıvılcımlarına bakıyor.{/n} "Hermesih'in armağanını bahşettiği kişi olmak onurların en büyüğü. Onu reddetmek ve hiçliğe karışmasına izin vermek kâfirliklerin en büyüğü olurdu."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
